nitf_ComponentInfoCarries information about the images, graphics, text, or extension components contained within the file

nitf_ExtensionsIteratorThe iterator defined for traversing an extension linearly

nitf_FieldWarningDescribes a warning associated with a field in the NITF
nitf_FileHeaderA structure representing the in-memory layout of the NITF file

nitf_ImageSourceThe base for harnessing a source
